item.title: NEED help with this code
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

okay when i log out it says member jake logged out not owner and coder jake logged out how do i fix it i want it to say owner and coder jake logged out heres the code

[code] if(playerRights == 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner and Coder " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jake”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Jake " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“King Slayer”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Skillz Pl0x”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerRights == 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerRights == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Modarator " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerIsMember == 0)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Non-Member " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerIsMember == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Member " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}

}[/code]

what do i need to add to it to make it say owner and coder jake logged out?

Read full topic
